Reviews.Title: “This Motel is now Motel 6, changed over and probably better”

Reviews.Content: booked online motel 6 web site listed location cheaper basically days inn sign removed motel 6 desk clerk nice offered help info etc nice inspected bed thoroughly bed bugs found none stayed king bed huge matress strange sleep clean pool indoors tiny extra morning coffee wifi free nice compaired motel 6s charge location sketchy am memphis dont walking scary people walking drove 15 minutes town beale st night left morning cheap stay cross country drive
